metadata.name: Hail Halloween '22!
metadata.description:
Aaaargh it's the Grand Reptilian Council!

Scare your friends and loved ones this Halloween with a life-like Official Hail Draconis Halloween Costume.

Made of genuine synthetic reptilian skin and based on full body casts of everybody's favourite Reptilian Overlords, these costumes are guaranteed to increase your treat to trick ratio by at least 69%!!

Remember kids, if you can't access mum or dad's wallet you MUST beg them to order YOUR costume NOW!

Hail Halloween.

Hail Draconis!
